name: Zion Survivors
summary: Customize your ship. Defeat or escape from chase enemies. Destroy city walls. Drive your ship to machine city. Begin to believe.

name: Zillion II: The Tri Formation
summary: They're at it again. The dreaded Norsa Empire is back... and stronger than ever before. This time they won't make any mistakes. Others have tried to stop them and all have failed. The evil Baron Ricks knows you are coming. And it's a trap! But you're the galaxy's last hope. Can you do what's never been done before?

name: Zip
summary: Zip is a visual logic game where you need to plot a path through the grid while passing through numbers in sequential order and filling the grid. New puzzles are released daily.

name: Ziro
summary: Ziro is innovative puzzle game offering incredible game-play in various levels of difficulty. You can relax and enjoy, or try to solve a serious puzzle that will prove to be a true challenge even for the experienced puzzle solver. So warm up the brain and cool down the earth!

name: Zig Zag
summary: Very hard reaction-based game.

name: Ziriax
summary: Ziriax is a horizontal scrolling shoot 'em up developed by The Whiz Kids and published by The Software Business. It was released in 1990 for the Amiga.

name: Zillion
summary: Zillion is a space adventure platform video game designed for the Sega Master System as a companion for the Zillion anime series in 1987. The game is a free-scrolling platform/adventure, similar to Epyx's Impossible Mission, in which objects must be inspected to enable things by accessing codes.

name: Zipang
summary: A PC Engine port of the game Solomon's Key.

name: Zitifono
summary: After a storm, your boat breaks down, but relax! The quirky inhabitants of Zitifono will help you to repair it. Embark on an adventure, swim, sail and discover all the secrets of the mysterious and colorful islands.

name: ZigZag
summary: Tap the screen and you’ll zig and you’ll zag. Get to the pickups and you’ll collect your swag. Jag your zigzagger’s passage through the obstacle damage. How many pickups can your zigzagger manage? Can you revel in your mettle and have success through several levels? Are you a bigger zigger? Can you be a zagger bragger? Time to test your talent in this zigger-zagger matter!

name: Zinkara
summary: "Zinkara" is a game created by a four-person team of passionate developers – a tribute to classic RPGs, told in the language of a new catastrophe.

name: Ziba
summary: This is a modern remake of the old calculator TI-84 game called BlockDude. The basic goal of the game is to move blocks to get over obstacles so you can reach your pink block. This will load the next puzzle.

name: Zip's Jumping Adventure
summary:
This vertical platformer challenges your reflexes, timing, and precision across 40 adventure levels and an endless arcade mode with over 1 billion unique combinations.

Collect coins as you ascend, and try to beat the gold time on each level. Collecting every coin and finishing under the gold time awards gold stars. It’s all about precision, speed, and finding the best path upward.

As you progress, you'll travel through a variety of environments and experience shifting times of day, including bright middays, glowing sunsets, and quiet midnight climbs. Each level encourages players to push their skills further.

Compete with friends and players around the world on global leaderboards. Every adventure level tracks your best time — can you claim the top spot?

Whether you're collecting every coin or racing for the best time, Zip’s Jumping Adventures delivers a focused, skill-based challenge with plenty of variety!

name: Ziggy
summary: Ziggy is a challenging platformer about a small lightning bolt trying to get back home. Your main objective is to go through all the traps and reach the end. Can you do it?

name: Zip: Set One
summary: A challenging and minimalist maze race game.

name: Ziggurat 3D Chess
summary: Ziggurat Three Dimensional Chess(TM), is a true three dimensional environment which combine the familiar movements of standard chess and exciting new moves never seen before. The rules of movement are easy to learn so beginners will be playing their first game in minutes. But the ultimate challenge of Ziggurat is greater than chess, because there are more pieces, more squares and more ways to move.

name: Zid Journey
summary: Zid Journey is a hand-drawn adventure game with a strong, classic 90's vibe. Play as Zid, a yellow dinosaur, and point-and-click his way as he goes on a journey to find the lost parents of a small Daspletosaurus hatchling!

name: Zix
summary: Spread chaos to lands locked in a cycle of order with a variety of powers and abilities in this multiplayer co-operative VR roguelike. Experience an intuitive combat system paired with fluid parkour-movement and versatile stacking boons earned through showing your devotion to the chaos god, ZIX.

name: Zinuru the Great
summary: A remarkable Action Sci-Fi adventure game.

name: Zippy Race
summary: The SG-1000 port of Zippy Race, otherwise known as Motorace USA.

name: Ziggy's Cosmic Adventures
summary: Ziggy's Cosmic Adventures is a VR cockpit game combining ship management with action-arcade combat. You play as a (sometimes effective) bounty hunter with possibly questionable morals, currently in possession of a powerful little alien that you may or may not have stolen/liberated from the evil Empire. As the Empire closes in, you'll need to find a way to balance your ship's management with the onslaught of attacks. Do you have what it takes to survive?

name: Zip Zap
summary: The player controls a robot sent to an unexplored planet called Hallucinor with the job of investigating it ahead of human colonisation. When it arrives, however, it is attacked by aliens and must manoeuvre its way through the planet, avoiding or killing the aliens, gathering fuel cells to remain powered, and escaping through teleportals to move on to the next level. The robot's circuitry has been damaged, however, so it cannot stop moving and has only limited braking power.

name: Zirquitz
summary: ZIRQUITZ is a chill yet deep graph-building game. Build and optimize an evolving graph of nodes to produce “Work,” your resource for upgrades and expansion. Discover synergy, power up your network, and unlock endless potential!

name: ZIC: Survival
summary: ZIC: Survival is a survival shooter where you feel The Zombie Apocalypse & become The Zombie Hunter!

name: ZigZag Fidget
summary:
It's a simple straight forward endless game that puts you in control of a fidget stick which is mostly controlled by some crazy laws of physics but other than that, you swipe to move the stick forward and tap at the right moment to make it stop. The game requires impeccable timing and concentration and is a major challenge even for veterans. 
The game's difficulty is deep embedded in its core. Everything has been built around it ensuring that players will love accepting this challenge.

name: ZigZag Ball
summary: ZigZag Ball is an endless casual game, switch sides to move forward in the world and do your best to stay on the right track and not fall, and collect diamonds.

name: Ziggurat
summary:
Dungeon-Crawling First Person Shooting at its finest! Fast-paced combat! Dozens of perks, spells and enemies! Level ups! Random Dungeons! Traps! Badass bosses! Carrots! Ziggurat is the best combination of First Person Shooter and Rogue-LITE you have ever seen.

Become a neophyte sorcerer, and get ready for your rite of passage: Enter the labyrinth and face dangerous challenges to prove your worth and become a powerful wizard!

The game focuses on fast-paced first person shooting, with an old-school vibe, and updated handling and game mechanics. Dungeon crawling and RPG/Roguelike elements are added into the mix, resulting in a fun, challenging and varied game, with lots of content to discover.

Fight almighty bosses, get through rooms filled with traps, and treasures that may help you in your journey... Each game is a whole new experience!

name: Zima
summary: A cozy pixel art RPG in a winter setting about a young woman who discovers her true purpose and combats a growing threat... Protect the Sacred Grotto and ensure that you are not overcome by the relentless cold!

name: Zipangu Jima: Unmei ha Saikoro ga Kimeru!?
summary: The main object of this history-based simulation board game is to control as many battle positions as possible. Procurement of all necessary resources is ultimately determined by a roll of the dice. Use the resources allotted to you to build roads and castles, or to strengthen your military. Instead of a good war strategy, your management of resources is what actually determines whether you win or lose.

name: Ziggurat 2
summary: Ziggurat is back, and now it's even better! Use powerful weapons and spells to break through hordes of enemies and explore laberynthine dungeons in this hectic roguelite FPS, while you improve your skills and discover new equipment. Will you be up to the task?

name: Zia and the goddesses of magic
summary:
In a world where magic is Queen, people lived happily and safely under the protection of the ten guardian goddesses. 
Out of the unknown came a powerful demon who brought trouble upon the world, and all the goddesses got captured and locked away. 
Zia is a little girl who lives in a village in the mountains with her parents. 
When she was younger, she discovered a spell book and started to practice magic. 
An old wise man came and told Zia about the existence of several spell books spread around the world. 
During her journey, Zia will discover the trapped goddesses. 
Now is your chance to help her rescue the goddesses from the evil creatures by casting magic spells!

name: Zipper
summary: Zipper is a tactics puzzle that recalls 8-bit isometric classics on the ZX Spectrum and MSX. A ridiculously swift swordsman seeks revenge on a castle full of enemies.

name: Zion
summary: Zion is a mobile game developed by aquatrax in collaboration with Shanghai HENIAN.

name: ZiL Truck RallyCross
summary: Brutal trucks on the track! Take a part in rallycross competitions on ZiL trucks arranged in different regions of the world. The game has ZIL-164, ZIL-130 and ZIL-433360 in multiple design options and tech specifications.

name: Zin & Zan
summary: A cooperative puzzle adventure set inside a zinc refinery. Play as two tiny workers, solve industrial challenges, carry molten zinc, operate machinery, and work together to keep the factory running.

name: Zippy Detective: Cats Hidden
summary: A puzzle game where you have to act like a detective to find the hidden cats in the city. Find all the cats and send them to space.

name: Zipp's Café
summary: Love, betrayal, and coffee! Zipp's Café is a "noir & chill" little game about a café between the city of animals and the district of insects. Make unusual recipes, get involved in shady dealings, and try to start a new life while searching for love and revenge.

name: Zigglox
summary: Team up with friends or get online and find bricks to build the highest and prettiest tower before the other team ! Beware though, some bricks are... specials!

name: ZIIAOL
summary: A remake of Zelda II - The Adventure of Link by HoverBat, created in GameMaker 1.4 for the PC.

name: Zilm: a game of reflex
summary: Zilm is the new PC and iPad game that tests the player's reflexes.

name: Zilado!
summary: Join a friend and travel through the state of Maranhão by train preventing it from stopping because of its broken wagons by solving small puzzles on this co-op platformer game

name: Zig
summary: 50 levels of fast-paced, old school, arcade blasting.

name: Zim Sala Bim
summary: You have to retrieve the gold the Sultan has stolen from your village.

name: Zibbs: Alien Survival
summary: Zibbs: Alien Survival is an open world game where you play as an alien trying to survive on the unknown planet - Earth.

name: ZigZag
summary: ZIGZAG is a little arcade game.

name: Zima uhodi!
summary: Play snowballs? In May? Why not!

name: Zip
summary: A vertical scrolling shoot'em up written by Alastair Darren Watts and published by The Power House for the Commodore 64.

name: Ziggy Zaggy
summary: Switch the sides to go further in the world.

name: Ziggy Road
summary:
Enjoy an Original & Unique driving game.
Zig Zag your way along the busiest craziest streets in the world.

name: Ziggurat
summary: Rogue-like RPG

name: Zimo: Mahjong Fanatic
summary: Zimo: Mahjong Fanatic is much more than a simple matching game. Zimo uses real mahjong rules with an innovated game play that will challenge your timing, skill, and luck. Clear all 45 challenging levels and earn your place in the top ten.

name: Ziggy's Chase
summary:
Never mind the plumber, the hedgehog is coming to Steam!
THE GAME FEATURES CLASSIC GAMEPLAY, AND VR MODE AS WELL.

name: Zing Zing Zip
summary: A shooter like many others. Shoot planes, tanks and a train. Very large bosses at the end of each level. Many power-ups like smartbombs, missiles and lasers. There is also some speech in the game.

name: Zidane: Football Generation
summary:
Live the ultimate football experience with Zidane Football Generation: 
 
- Three different views available during the match. 
- Three game modes: Friendly, arcade, tournament. 
- 16 national teams at different levels. 
- Save games during tournaments. 
 
And not forgetting the star himself, Zidane!

name: Ziode Shadow
summary: Ziode Shadow is a unique 2D platform/puzzle game about a hungover planet explorer, and his unwanted bot companion. He must use his 'Move Device' to utilize many different objects, and manipulate his surroundings, enabling both him, and his support pod to navigate the terrain.

name: Ziva and the Wolves
summary:
Ziva is dying. There is no cure.
Two men are looking for a sword that would save the realm. But to wield it would kill them.
This group of three ventures deep into the depths of the Goddess' temple, to find...?

name: Ziggy the Chaser
summary: Adventure game with lots of levels filled with pure fun! Collect all crystals in one area to proceed to another.

name: Zippy the Circle: Level 11, Level 12, & Level 13
Zig Zag Tilt
summary: Tilt your device to weave through the endless zig zag!

name: Z is for Zombie
summary:
While on an expedition to some recently discovered ruins near Machu Picchu in Peru, world renowned archaeologist Max Jones is bitten by an unknown insect. Hours later he dies. His interns transport Max’s body back to camp where an ambulance takes him to the morgue. Two miles from the hospital they are attacked. 48 Hours later all of South America is under martial law.
The rest of the world turns attempts to turn a blind eye to the events happening in Peru, but as the infection spreads news reports begin to leak out. 72 Hours after Max dies, the infection is global.
Hoping to stock up before it is too late, you decide to make a quick run to the mall to gather supplies. That was your first mistake.

name: Zippy the Circle: Level 8, Level 9, & Level 10
Zigfrak
summary: Zigfrak is a space-based action RPG, featuring missions, exploration, and crafting. With an emphasis on loot and over-the-top items, it's not a traditional space sim. Enemy ships explode like loot piñatas, spewing forth useful pickups.

name: Zippr Fleet
summary: Join ZiPPR Fleet and grow in its ranks! Relax, have fun, and develop dexterity!

name: Zig Zag Cat: Ostrich Club mo Oosawagi da
summary:
Zig Zag Cat (also known as Zig Zag Cat: Ostrich Club mo Oosawagi da) is a puzzle-action game from Opera House and Den'Z featuring a young hero and his shapeshifting cat. The gameplay is a mixture of a vertical-scrolling shoot 'em up and Breakout. The player can collect money, which unlocks various bonuses, as well as Arkanoid-style power-ups that include a fireball that will go straight through blocks instead of being deflected. They can also send the bat forward a short distance, which helps to collect items, defeat enemies and hit the ball.

The game was released exclusively in Japan for the Super Famicom in 1994.

name: Zill O'll Infinite
summary:
Zill O’ll Infinite is a remastered and expanded version of the original PS1 JRPG Zill O’ll, released for the PlayStation 2. It features updated graphics and audio, new characters, dungeons, scenarios, and multiple endings. Set in the open world of Vyashion, players create a customizable character and complete missions through an adventurer’s guild. The game offers turn-based combat and a flexible story path shaped by player choices and relationships with various NPCs, leading to over 50 possible endings.

An enhanced PSP version, Zill O’ll Infinite Plus, added even more content and story elements.

name: Ziggy
summary: Sharpen your speed and dexterity playing Ziggy, an arcade-style game with four levels of play. Use your keyboarding skills to clear all of the words from the pyramid pillars and change them to the new target color, while avoiding the bad guys.

name: Zipball
summary: Zipball is an Action game, developed and published by Sachen, which was released in Asia in 1993.

name: Zinnia
summary:
An early freeware action RPG very much inspired by Ys, Zinnia still only ran in monochrome mode, as most DOS games until 1992 did. 
 
Most interestingly, programmer Kim Jongsuk later formed a "multimedia band" with the same name as the game, which were active in the late 1990s and released two albums2. Their album covers featured fantasy RPG-esque photoshop jobs, but their music is impossible to find nowadays.

name: Zig Zag Boom
summary:
Control an orb ball along the zigzag path and don't hit the wall.
Tap to switch the direction! How fast can you react?
Sound simple? Challenge yourself in this amazing free arcade game!

name: Zipple World
summary: This is the story of Zipple, a frog warrior who must collect the objects scattered in his world of mazes and then bring them into the homes of her village.

name: Zippy the Circle: Level 5, Level 6 & Level 7
Zillions of Enemy X: Zetsukai no Crusade
summary: A game based on the "Z/X Zillions of enemy X" collectible card game series.

name: Ziggurat
summary: A 2012 action game for iOS platforms designed by Tim Rogers. As the last remaining human, make your stand and take as many alien freaks as possible down with you. An Android version is in the works.

name: Zippy the Porcupine
summary: Homebrew game created by "Sprybug" from the Atari Age forums. Basically a Sonic the Hedgehog clone for the 2600.

name: Zissi's Island
summary: Zissi's Island is an open-world 3D platformer set on a tropical island with emphasis on exploration.

name: ZiParate
summary: A puzzle-platformer about a ghost-looking character that has to collect jewels in various colors.

name: Zippy Froger
summary: There are several frogs and caterpillars on the screen. The player must strategically bounce the frogs' tongues off of each other in order to reach and eat all caterpillars.

name: ZikSquare
summary:
The music score becomes the game ! Compose your music-level and play it in this fusion of a platformer and a music editor ! 
 
ZikSquare brings you a new concept ! 
 
Each musical note is played by the game and is a block that your character has to slide on, to jump on or to dodge.

name: Zippy the Circle Challenge: Level 11C, Level 12C, and Level 13C
Zippy the Circle Challenge: Level 5C, Level 6C, and Level 7C
Zippy the Circle Challenge: Level 3C and Level 4C
Zippy the Circle Challenge: Level 1C and Level 2C
Zim's Word Game
summary: In this fast-paced word game, you build words from falling tiles before your game board fills up. Compete with your friends on the global leaderboards for high scores and longest time played. Always keep an eye out for the Word Of The Day.

name: Zipang
summary: A platformer/puzzle game based on a Japanese movie. It is heavily inspired by Tecmo's Solomon's Key.

name: Zilla: Shadow of the Bridge
summary: An indie action-adventure game about a 'Zilla battling evil Bridge-Kin in San Francisco, vanquishing over-the-top bosses and building alliances on his way to Reach, Overcome, and Vanquish his Kaiju clan's ultimate foe - the Golden Gate Bridge. The Fiend shall Fall!

name: Zip Zap
summary:
Touch to contract.
Release to let go.
Bring the clumsy mechanical beings home.

name: Ziona Quest
summary:
The Year is 1023, the call went out for brave souls to come join the quest to help humanity free themselves and return the Earth to her true heavenly glory...

...you answered.

WELCOME BRAVE SOUL!!

Ziona Quest is a frantic platformer where skill, strategy and quick reactions are essential if you are to complete your mission.

name: Zipple World 2: The Sweet Chaos
summary:
The story of Zipple continues!
The frog warrior this time must save the companions of the village and bring them to the houses scattered throughout the playing field.

name: Zipper
summary: A sci-fi realtime strategy rougelike

name: Ziircon
summary: Ziircon is a RPG rogue-lite platformer, with procedurally generated mind-bending, bone-breaking dungeons. You rise from the dead, an average squire. You die and rise evermore to defeat what corrupted the world. The entire world crushes you over and over. Can you prevail over this challenge?

name: Zippy the Circle Challenge: Level 8C, Level 9C, and Level 10C
Zine Fair Lady
summary: A game about small publications and microagressions

name: ZIC: Zombies in City
summary: ZIC: Zombies In City is a first person zombie survival shooter where you have to save the world from a zombie apocalypse!

name: Zig Zag Ball
summary:
"ZIG ZAG BALL" is a simple ball action game based on Putting Golf, Billard and Pin ball.
Enjoy this fantastic and comical game starred by unique characters and ball characters with your family!

name: Zip! Speedster of Valiant City
summary: Use your speedster powers to defeat the super-powered sloth and save the day, all while tracking down a deadly new weapon threatening your city! There's no room for error in the hero business, not even for the fastest person in the world.

name: ZigZagging Ski
summary: Do you remember the last time you were on vacation?

name: Zimbo
summary:
You will play as Zimbo in an action/adventure/platformer/runner that will push you to the brink with a challenge worthy of the old school.

But who is Zimbo...?
A world-renowned, legendary hero with a career of success in some of the most dangerous and critical missions the world has seen...

That's the man the world knows...but I know Zimbo...and there's a story to be told to find out how the scrawny, meek Mike I knew became the "Amazing" Zimbo...

....I'm going to make him tell that story and you are going to help me.

name: Zippy the Circle: Special
summary: A game in the "Zippy the Circle" series! This game's release is part of Breakthrough Gaming's "Bible Video Game Sundays"!

name: Zink
summary: A unique puzzle game with serene, procedural graphics and timeless gameplay. Bump cubes into the ocean, until only one remain, and you have sunk the island!

name: Zimmer
summary: An action roguelike, heavily inspired by games such as nethack.

name: Zillernet
summary: ZillerNet is an karaoke game, developed by Studio9 and published by Microsoft Game Studios, which was released in Korea in 2005.

name: Zi
summary: Zi - is a classical casual arcade battle tanks shooter, with realistic 3d physics engine, smart (AI-like) enemies, 'bosses' and map editor.

name: ZiDouQianWen
summary: I am a destiny question and answer game based on Zi Wei Dou Shu, a Chinese astrology system. Come and explore the mysteries of destiny with me!

name: Zigamus: Zombies at Vigamus
summary: A game written by Marco Vallarino for the Annual Interactive Fiction Competition.

name: Zig Zag Jump: Fantasy Challenge
summary: Click to Jump along the zig-zag course. You must direct a character across a fantasy winding path.

name: Ziegel: An Arcade Platformer
summary:
Jump, land, jump in this simple yet challenging retro arcade platformer. 
 
Master the movement, time your jumps, get the high score.

name: Zilar: Empire of The Underground
summary: Zilar is an exploration adventure game developed by two young developers, where we control the main character Zemandevi.

name: Ziggy's Labyrinth
summary: Ziggy's Labyrinth is a level based snake game. Traverse through portals, teleport around the map, and phase through walls in over 150 stages.

name: Zidane: Football Generation 2002
summary: Zidane: Football Generation 2002 is a Sports game, developed by Aqua Pacific and published by Cryo Interactive, which was released in Europe in 2002.

name: ZigZag Drifter
summary: ZigZag Drifter is a thrilling driving game that puts you behind the wheel of a car that doesn't quite behave like a typical vehicle.

name: Zineth
summary: A movement based adventure game released in 2012 by Arcane Kids. Features unique integration of Twitter through an in-game smartphone.

name: Zigzag Car
summary: Zigzag Car is an endless journey through nature where players collect coins to unlock new cars. The more coin they collect, the faster they go, making it even more challenging. Along the way, players can get special items such as multiplier coins. The goal? Collect as many coins as possible!

name: Zio and the Magic Scrolls
summary:
Magic Scrolls allow even ordinary humans to use magic!
You too can become the world's strongest wizard as long as you have the magic scrolls created by Zio!

name: Zico Soccer
summary: Zico Soccer is a football management video game that allows players to become the head coach of an international football team; it was named after the soccer legend Zico (also known as the White Pelé).

name: ZI Survival
summary: You are stranded in the vast expanse of the island. Alone, without any means to call for help, you must do what you can to survive. Explore The land as you hunt for supplies to craft the tools, weapons, and base you’ll need to stay alive. Stay Alive!

name: Zig Zag Go
summary: Use the touch screen to switch directions quickly and avoid oncoming shapes. Endless fun for everyone!

name: Z.I.O.N.
summary: Z.I.O.N. - First-person shooter in a post-apocalyptic setting, where robotic creatures take over the planet and Z.I.O.N. group agents are trying to save the world.

name: Ziq
summary: Run, dodge, jump, pull pickups, switch polarity and die constantly! You get to do all this while being heckled for your constant mistakes! "ZIQ" is an arcade runner that features polarity-switching gameplay. Switch ZIQ's polarity to make it safely past obstacles or in some cases destroy them. Perform pickup sequences, maintain chains, destroy obstacles and time your pulls to take advantage of the in depth scoring system while you compete on the global leaderboard!

name: ZigZag
summary:
Stay on the wall and do as many zigzags as you can!

Just tap the screen to change the direction of the ball. Try not to fall off the edges!

How far can you go?
